effect.name: Diamond Pattern Transition
effect.author: NaitorStudios
effect.description: This shader creates a dynamic diamond pattern based on the pixel size and progress parameters.

parameter.name: Size
parameter.description: Size of each diamond in pixels. Controls the overall scale of the diamond pattern.

parameter.name: Progress
parameter.description: Controls the visibility of the diamond pattern. Ranges from 0 (fully visible) to 1 (completely hidden).
